title: Dejafloppa

content: SpecificationsName: DejacoinPoW Algorithm: SCRYPTMax Supply: 400 000 DJCBlock reward: 20 DJCBlock time: 5 minutesWallet/CpuMinerWindowsOthersGithubDiscordBlock explorerEmail

comments.author: SpeedyDale08
comments.body: What is mining command for wallet

comments.author: Dejafloppa
comments.body: Quote from: SpeedyDale08 on October 08, 2022, 11:53:48 PMWhat is mining command for walletsetgenerate true

comments.author: FlaJa
comments.body: is not a fair start   plus premine in a low max supply ^^and no extras here a only copy and past scrypt algo

comments.author: Dejafloppa
comments.body: Quote from: FlaJa on October 09, 2022, 01:42:30 PMis not a fair start   plus premine in a low max supply ^^and no extras here a only copy and past scrypt algoschool started so I don't have the time to add extras, I barely managed to squeeze out time to finish the initial release, I'll reset the blockchain shortly and I'll get rid of the premine

comments.author: FlaJa
comments.body: Quote from: Dejafloppa on October 09, 2022, 01:48:24 PMQuote from: FlaJa on October 09, 2022, 01:42:30 PMis not a fair start   plus premine in a low max supply ^^and no extras here a only copy and past scrypt algoschool started so I don't have the time to add extras, I barely managed to squeeze out time to finish the initial release, I'll reset the blockchain shortly and I'll get rid of the premineKeep your premine these can be used for developments. Resetting will not make the miners happy. Without extras, this project will not survive long. rather take your time and develop something else. In addition, the scrypt algo is not resistant to attacks only with PoW. Either PoW and PoS or combined algos (just a tip, many scrypt algos were attacked)

In addition, the scrypt algo is not resistant to attacks only with PoW. Either PoW and PoS or combined algos (just a tip, many scrypt algos were attacked)I'm actually restarting the blockchain because someone brought out an entire crypto farm and the difficulty spiked, I'll try to switch algos though I can't promise anything as of right now and on the bright side no one mined anything before the attack so not many people will be mad

comments.author: FlaJa
comments.body: Quote from: Dejafloppa on October 09, 2022, 01:56:14 PMQuote from: FlaJa on October 09, 2022, 01:52:59 PMQuote from: Dejafloppa on October 09, 2022, 01:48:24 PMQuote from: FlaJa on October 09, 2022, 01:42:30 PMis not a fair start   plus premine in a low max supply ^^and no extras here a only copy and past scrypt algoschool started so I don't have the time to add extras, I barely managed to squeeze out time to finish the initial release, I'll reset the blockchain shortly and I'll get rid of the premineKeep your premine these can be used for developments. Either PoW and PoS or combined algos (just a tip, many scrypt algos were attacked)I'm actually restarting the blockchain because someone brought out an entire crypto farm and the difficulty spiked, I'll try to switch algos though I can't promise anything as of right now and on the bright side no one mined anything before the attack so not many people will be madThen close the nodes so that no more coins are mined and reset the coins to zero. the miners will have to accept it. As long as the next start is fair, everything is fine.Use a different algo and use hybrid (pow and pos). With the small number of coins you can do 50% PoW and 50% PoS. Don't forget that the max number of coins cannot be mined in a short period of time.
